DisableStructure Methods

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Node»Structure»MultiFrameStructure. View the class hierarchy.

MethodDescription
Change Disable StyleChanges the disable structure to a Diagram Disable structure, a Conditional Disable structure, or a Type Specialization structure. Details
Get Frame IndexReturns the index of the Conditional Disable structure subdiagram whose Condition matches the string you specify. Details
Remove Empty FramesRemoves any empty subdiagrams from the Conditional Disable structure you specify. Details
